Question: This person plays a central role in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed (2008).
Hints: This person was also ranked number two on Empire magazine's 2008 list of The 100 Greatest Movie Characters.
The news of her death breaks what remains of this person's spirit, and he screams in torment.
